title: My pixel 3 fell down and its screen got broken
content:
llo,

My Pixel 3 fell and the screen is broken. as there is no support for my country I need to take to a third party to fix , however no one has the screen.

i found only a glass and full LCD how can i decide which one to buy.
Kindly see the pictures attached.

If you know a good place to by from appreciate if you can lead me to it
